titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation William R.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At end of text: Given at our court at Kensington the eighth day of February, 1699.
Proclamation ordering all Catholic priests and Jesuits out of England.

person.persName: Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb
